verses.text: \w King|strong="H4428"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*, however, loved \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w foreign|strong="H5237"\w* \w women|strong="H1323"\w* along \w with|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H8010"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*—\w women|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4125"\w*, \w Ammon|strong="H4125"\w*, Edom, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* Sidon, \w as|strong="H1323"\w* well \w as|strong="H1323"\w* \w Hittite|strong="H2850"\w* \w women|strong="H1323"\w*.

\w These|strong="H1992"\w* \w women|strong="H1992"\w* \w were|strong="H3478"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w about|strong="H4480"\w* \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w told|strong="H8010"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w*, “\w You|strong="H3808"\w* \w must|strong="H1121"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* intermarry \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*, \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w surely|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w turn|strong="H5186"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w hearts|strong="H3824"\w* \w after|strong="H4480"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* gods.” \w Yet|strong="H3068"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w clung|strong="H1692"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w these|strong="H1992"\w* \w women|strong="H1992"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* love.

\w He|strong="H5186"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* wives \w of|strong="H3820"\w* \w royal|strong="H8282"\w* birth \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w concubines|strong="H6370"\w*—\w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w his|strong="H5186"\w* wives \w turned|strong="H5186"\w* \w his|strong="H5186"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w away|strong="H5186"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3068"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* grew \w old|strong="H2209"\w*, \w his|strong="H3068"\w* wives \w turned|strong="H5186"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* \w after|strong="H1961"\w* other gods, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w wholeheartedly|strong="H3824"\w* \w devoted|strong="H8003"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* father \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w been|strong="H1961"\w*.

\w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w followed|strong="H3212"\w* \w Ashtoreth|strong="H6253"\w* \w the|strong="H8010"\w* goddess \w of|strong="H8251"\w* \w the|strong="H8010"\w* \w Sidonians|strong="H6722"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w Milcom|strong="H4445"\w* \f + \fr 11:5 \ft Milcom is a variant of Molech; also in verse 33; see verse 7 and Leviticus 18:21.\f* \w the|strong="H8010"\w* \w abomination|strong="H8251"\w* \w of|strong="H8251"\w* \w the|strong="H8010"\w* \w Ammonites|strong="H5984"\w*.

\w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*; \w unlike|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* father \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w follow|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* completely.

\w At|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H1121"\w* \w time|strong="H6440"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w hill|strong="H2022"\w* \w east|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w high|strong="H1116"\w* \w place|strong="H1116"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w Chemosh|strong="H3645"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w abomination|strong="H8251"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w Molech|strong="H4432"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w abomination|strong="H8251"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Ammonites|strong="H1121"\w*.

\w He|strong="H6213"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w same|strong="H3651"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w foreign|strong="H5237"\w* wives, \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w burned|strong="H6999"\w* \w incense|strong="H6999"\w* \w and|strong="H6213"\w* \w sacrificed|strong="H2076"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* gods. God’s Anger against Solomon

\w Now|strong="H6471"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* grew angry \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w turned|strong="H5186"\w* \w away|strong="H5186"\w* \w from|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w appeared|strong="H7200"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w* \w twice|strong="H6471"\w*.

\w Although|strong="H3808"\w* \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* warned Solomon \w explicitly|strong="H1697"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w follow|strong="H3212"\w* \w other|strong="H2088"\w* gods, Solomon \w did|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*’s \w command|strong="H6680"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* said \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*, “\w Because|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w done|strong="H1961"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* \w My|strong="H8104"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w My|strong="H8104"\w* \w statutes|strong="H2708"\w*, \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w*, \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w tear|strong="H7167"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w* \w away|strong="H5973"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*.

Nevertheless, \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w sake|strong="H4616"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H6213"\w* \w father|strong="H1121"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H1121"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w it|strong="H6213"\w* \w during|strong="H3117"\w* \w your|strong="H6213"\w* \w lifetime|strong="H3117"\w*; \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H1121"\w* \w tear|strong="H7167"\w* \w it|strong="H6213"\w* \w out|strong="H6213"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H6213"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*.

\w Yet|strong="H7535"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H5650"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w tear|strong="H7167"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w* \w away|strong="H7167"\w* \w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w*. \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H5650"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w for|strong="H4616"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sake|strong="H4616"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w My|strong="H5414"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w for|strong="H4616"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sake|strong="H4616"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w which|strong="H7626"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* chosen.” Hadad’s Return

\w Then|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w raised|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w against|strong="H6965"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w an|strong="H6965"\w* \w adversary|strong="H7854"\w*, \w Hadad|strong="H1908"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* Edomite, \w from|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w royal|strong="H4428"\w* \w line|strong="H2233"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Edom.

Earlier, \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H6912"\w* Edom, \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w commander|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H8269"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w army|strong="H6635"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w gone|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H5927"\w* \w bury|strong="H6912"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w dead|strong="H2491"\w* \w and|strong="H1732"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w struck|strong="H5221"\w* \w down|strong="H5221"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w male|strong="H2145"\w* \w in|strong="H6912"\w* Edom.

\w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w had|strong="H3478"\w* \w stayed|strong="H3427"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w months|strong="H2320"\w*, \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H3478"\w* killed \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w male|strong="H2145"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* Edom.

\w But|strong="H1931"\w* \w Hadad|strong="H1908"\w*, still just \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w young|strong="H5288"\w* \w boy|strong="H5288"\w*, \w had|strong="H4714"\w* \w fled|strong="H1272"\w* \w to|strong="H4714"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, along \w with|strong="H4714"\w* some Edomites \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w were|strong="H4714"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w of|strong="H5650"\w* \w his|strong="H1931"\w* father.

Hadad \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w men|strong="H3947"\w* \w set|strong="H5414"\w* \w out|strong="H5414"\w* \w from|strong="H3947"\w* \w Midian|strong="H4080"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w went|strong="H4428"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w Paran|strong="H6290"\w*. \w They|strong="H5414"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w men|strong="H3947"\w* \w from|strong="H3947"\w* \w Paran|strong="H6290"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w went|strong="H4428"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w who|strong="H4428"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* Hadad \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* land \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w provided|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w food|strong="H3899"\w*.

\w There|strong="H4672"\w* \w Hadad|strong="H1908"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* such \w great|strong="H3966"\w* \w favor|strong="H2580"\w* \w in|strong="H4672"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w that|strong="H5414"\w* \w he|strong="H5414"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H4672"\w* marriage \w the|strong="H5414"\w* sister \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w Queen|strong="H1377"\w* \w Tahpenes|strong="H8472"\w*, \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w own|strong="H5869"\w* wife.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* sister \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Tahpenes|strong="H8472"\w* \w bore|strong="H3205"\w* Hadad \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* named \w Genubath|strong="H1592"\w*. \w Tahpenes|strong="H8472"\w* herself \w weaned|strong="H1580"\w* \w him|strong="H3205"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*’s \w palace|strong="H1004"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Genubath|strong="H1592"\w* \w lived|strong="H8432"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*.

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w Hadad|strong="H1908"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w in|strong="H4191"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w had|strong="H1732"\w* \w rested|strong="H7901"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* fathers \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w*, \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w commander|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H8269"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w army|strong="H6635"\w*, \w was|strong="H1732"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w said|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*, “\w Let|strong="H7971"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H4714"\w* return \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w own|strong="H5973"\w* country.”

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w asked|strong="H4100"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w*, “\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w lacked|strong="H2638"\w* \w here|strong="H2005"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* suddenly \w want|strong="H1245"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w back|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* \w own|strong="H5973"\w* country?” “\w Nothing|strong="H3808"\w*,” Hadad replied, “\w but|strong="H3588"\w* please \w let|strong="H7971"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w*.” Rezon’s Hostility

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* God \w raised|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w against|strong="H6965"\w* Solomon another \w adversary|strong="H7854"\w*, \w Rezon|strong="H7331"\w* \w the|strong="H6965"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Eliada, \w who|strong="H1121"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w fled|strong="H1272"\w* \w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H6965"\w* master, \w Hadadezer|strong="H1909"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Zobah|strong="H6678"\w*,

\w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w gathered|strong="H6908"\w* \w men|strong="H1416"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w himself|strong="H3427"\w*. \w When|strong="H1961"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w killed|strong="H2026"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Zobaites, Rezon captained \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w band|strong="H1416"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w raiders|strong="H1416"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w Damascus|strong="H1834"\w*, \w where|strong="H5921"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w settled|strong="H3427"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* gained control.

Rezon \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*’s \w enemy|strong="H7854"\w* \w throughout|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*, adding \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w trouble|strong="H7451"\w* \w caused|strong="H1961"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w Hadad|strong="H1908"\w*. \w So|strong="H1961"\w* Rezon \w ruled|strong="H4427"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* Aram \w with|strong="H5921"\w* hostility \w toward|strong="H5921"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*. Jeroboam’s Rebellion
